metadata.name: Test-Driven Development (TDD) Workflow
metadata.description: Implement features using strict TDD methodology: write tests first, implement minimal code, refactor for quality.

steps.action: Write failing tests that specify expected behavior (Red phase)
Implement minimal code to make tests pass (Green phase)
Refactor code for readability, performance, and maintainability
Add edge case tests and property-based tests
Review test coverage and suggest missing test scenarios
Analyze test failures and identify regression issues
Generate coverage report and ensure >90% code coverage

benefits: Higher code quality through test-first approach
Better design decisions driven by testability
Comprehensive test coverage from the start
Faster debugging with clear test specifications
